explains: n. 相关性，实用性，意义

sentences.en: Politicians' private lives have no relevance to their public roles.
sentences.cn: 政治家的私生活与他们的公众角色没有相关性。

sentences.en: This maxim of relevance is quite efficient to use.
sentences.cn: 这种关联准则用起来非常有效。

sentences.en: Perhaps the students do not understand the relevance of the material to their studies.
sentences.cn: 也许学生们不理解这些材料与他们的学习的相关性。
